description: A former government research facility island that was devastated by Caesar Clown's gas weapon experiment four years ago, leaving it split between a burning side and a frozen side. In this episode, it becomes the stage for the deadly Shinokuni weapon demonstration.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Reveals Punk Hazard's Destruction
keyEvents.description: Caesar narrates how he killed Punk Hazard four years ago using the H2S gas bomb, revealing the island's tragic history.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the dark origins of Punk Hazard's current state and establishes Caesar as the architect of its destruction.

keyEvents.title: Death of Smiley
keyEvents.description: Smiley dies on Punk Hazard, transforming into the deadly Shinokuni gas that spreads across the island.
keyEvents.significance: The island becomes a death trap as Shinokuni spreads, forcing all inhabitants to flee or risk petrification.

keyEvents.title: Shinokuni Weapon Unleashed
keyEvents.description: The Shinokuni gas spreads across Punk Hazard, petrifying everything in its path and creating a zone of death.
keyEvents.significance: Transforms the island into an active war zone where the deadly gas threatens all life.

statusHistory.reason: Island was devastated by Caesar's H2S gas experiment four years before the current events
Island is currently inhabited by Caesar Clown and his subordinates, as well as the Straw Hat Pirates

name.japanese: パンクハザード研究所

description: Caesar Clown's main research laboratory on Punk Hazard, where he conducts his experiments and houses his subordinates. It serves as the refuge point for the Straw Hats fleeing from Shinokuni.

keyEvents.title: Lab Shutters Begin to Close
keyEvents.description: The iron shutters of the laboratory begin closing as the Straw Hats approach, threatening to trap them outside with the Shinokuni gas.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a tense race against time for the heroes to reach safety.

keyEvents.title: Kin'emon and Zoro Cut Through Iron Shutters
keyEvents.description: Kin'emon and Zoro work together to slice through the heavy iron shutters blocking the entrance.
keyEvents.significance: Enables the group's entry into the laboratory and safety from Shinokuni.

keyEvents.title: All Allies Reach the Laboratory
keyEvents.description: All of the Straw Hats and their allies successfully make it inside Caesar's laboratory just before the Shinokuni gas reaches them.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the escape sequence and sets up the next phase of confrontation with Caesar.

statusHistory.reason: Laboratory is operational and serves as Caesar's base of operations
